body.name: Otcboimo PC Power Switch, Computer Remote Switch Button Boot Card Desktop Computer On Off Switch Button Card Work with Apple Homekit(Contains a Power SW Cable)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Easy Installation: Otcboimo Wireless remote control computer switch card suitable for all computers with PCIE card slots. It is applicable to both PCI-E X1/PCI-E X4/PCI-E X8/PCI-E X16, easy to install, don't need any driver software.
App Remote Control(Note:Home hub is required): Remote Control your computer on Homekit anytime anywhere by your samrtphone and you will know the computer status on App.
Voice Control: Install the corresponding smart app, you can control your computer on/off via your voice.

Wi-Fi Control Power Switch PC: you can use 2.4G control the computer boot card, 5G network cannot be paired. (Note: If your Wi-Fi router is 2.4G and 5G connected with the network, please reconfigure the router and select the 2.4G network separately)

Safety and Stable: The computer power switch is equipped with a WIFI enhanced antenna to ensure stable WiFi connection. The original switch buttons on the computer can be used normally, no impact on the computer.
Note: Before you buy the pc remote control switch, please check whether your computer has vacant PCIE card slot and whether the motherboard has power after the computer is turned off.

Worried about information security? This computer remote switch card only reads the computer's power on and off status and does not require the installation of any software. It is equivalent to a mechanical button and does not read any other information. It is a safe and reliable desktop computer DIY accessory.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Otcboimo Computer Remote Wireless Power Button
APP REMOTE CONTROL THE DESTOP COMPUTER
HOW TO INSTALL THE BOOT CARD FOR COMPUTER

Boot Card Control with HOMEKIT Common Issues Branded computers are not available: Reason: The brand machine motherboard is integrated together, and the Power SW cable cannot be pulled out and connected to the pin of the boot card. The problem of not being connected: Solution: If scanning the QR code on the bag cannot be connected, please enter the digital connection directly. Automatic restart of the power card after computer shutdown: Reason: After the computer is turned off, the motherboard has no power and cannot provide power to the device. Solution: You can get the card to work by enabling PCIe power when shut down. Can the original button still be used after installing this power-on card? Yes! The original button can be use after installing our pc computer on/off remoter control card.

The problem of not being connected: Solution: If scanning the QR code on the bag cannot be connected, please enter the digital connection directly. Automatic restart of the power card after computer shutdown: Reason: After the computer is turned off, the motherboard has no power and cannot provide power to the device. Solution: You can get the card to work by enabling PCIe power when shut down. Can the original button still be used after installing this power-on card? Yes! The original button can be use after installing our pc computer on/off remoter control card.

HOW TO USE THE PC POWER REMOTE SWITCH CARD ? After installation, observe the WIFI indicator flashing to distribute the network. Reset the distribution network: press and hold the SET button for 5 seconds, the red light flashes and the reset is successful. (1)Add or scan accessories in the upper right corner of the Home APP; (2)Scan the QR code on the power-on card or package to add accessories; (3)Add to home; (4)choose position; (5)Set the socket name, such as computer; (6)Added successfully; (7)Open computer; (8)Colse computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Could include better instructions but works flawlessly with HomeKit. Had it installed for a month now with no problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well with Apple Home, instructions missing key step.
reviews.reviewText: From a hardware perspective, this device couldn't be simpler. Just insert the card into a free PCI-E slot, disconnect your power switch wire from the motherboard, connect it to the card, and then plug the cable from the card into the power switch pins on your motherboard. The device does not interface with the motherboard; it simply utilizes the PCI-E slot for power.Setting up the device via an iPhone requires no app download, as it works natively in Apple Home. The only potential hiccup is that the included directions make no mention of putting the card in pairing mode. This is done by briefly holding the only switch on the device, and pairing mode is indicated by alternating red and blue LEDs. Afterward, scan a QR code, and Apple Home will guide you through the rest of the setup. Note that your iPhone must be connected to a 2.4GHz WiFi to set up this device, a requirement consistent with other HomeKit devices I've encountered.Once set up, the device performed well for both shutting down and powering on my PC. Some reviewers have noted that Apple Home does not accurately display the true power state of the PC, noting it always shows "on." However, this was not the case for my PC; Apple Home consistently reflected the correct power state without any issues.This is an excellent solution for PCs that lack support for Wake On LAN, especially for users within the Apple Home ecosystem, such as iPhone or iPad users.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Apple devices only. Android users are SOL
reviews.reviewText: Works if you're on iOS but if you're on android good luck getting this to work without jumping through hell and back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the smart home lifestyle
reviews.reviewText: After looking forever for a solution like this I finally found one that works flawlessly was able to integrate it seamlessly into my smart home to power my PC up when I a dive home in the evening so I can jump on the game as soon as I get home. Is it lazy? Absolutely. But I live it 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely need IOS device
reviews.reviewText: You might think the lack of support for android is a problem more likely created by Apple, but I intended to control this device with Home Assistant via the homekit integration. The only problem is it needs homekit devices to at least be connected to the wifi network, and this one refuses to let you do that without an IPhone. When using the cozylife app (which I'm pretty sure is just Tuya based so you could also use the Smart Life app), it says you either need to use the IOS app to apple home.Apart from this, it seems pretty well made with a nice way of powering on the computer - you can either use the built in power button or the device will send it's own signal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works for turning on and off your PC in HomeKit! Setup was a little rough, since you have to hit a button to put it in pairing mode while the PC is on. Also, it always displays as “ON” in the Home app regardless of PC state. To turn the PC on, you have to turn the switch off then back on. But, it does work consistently and turns the PC off in a way that allows the OS to do it nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended
reviews.reviewText: Works great if you want your computer to turn on or off using HomeKit. Note: make sure the red light on the board is flashing before you pair it to your HomeKit using the code, if it is not flashing, then press and hold the button on the board for about 5 seconds to put it in pairing mode, (this is not mentioned in the instructions).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Took a white to get Homekit to work, works fine
reviews.reviewText: Once you figure out the badly translated instruction manual, the card works well. Be aware that it will only work when connected directly to a pcie slot. It will not work with a pcie riser or adapter.
